resources.string: Experienced full-stack software engineer experienced in crafting sophisticated enterprise systems applying development and operational skills to work

Experienced full-stack software engineer with 4 years of hands-on experience crafting sophisticated enterprise systems applying development and operational skills to work. Experienced in back-end engineering, software development, implementation, and streamlining architecture design. Successfully deployed microservice architecture systems and migration from monolith to microservices. Proficient team leader who manages projects through all software development life cycle phases. Proven ability to write efficient and reusable code, and strong collaborative skills.
Mongolian University of Science and Technology
